title: Minimum average power to move charge from rest

content.prompt: The electric potential is 50 V at point X and 70 V at point Y. What is the minimum average power needed by an external force to move a charge of 4 µC from rest at X to rest at Y in 5 s ?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
